name: Jerry Rice & Nitus' Dog Football

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Judobaby/Jerry Rice & Nitus' Dog Football/bin/Dog Football.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Groupees archive
game:
  arch: win32

installer:
